SEARCH
Module Lab_5
Package КІ305.Денисяк.Lab5

Class Fio

java.lang.Object
КІ305.Денисяк.Lab5.Fio
public class Fio extends Object
Fio class implements my equation according to the variant tan(x)/ctg(x). If we simplify the equation tan(x)/ctg(x), we can get the equation tan^2(x). Because it's easier to calculate, so I'll use the equation tan^2(x). Also implements read and write methods in text and binary formats.
